name: Menemen
author: Yoly
summary: This Turkish-inspired egg dish is very similar to the way some Mexican egg breakfasts are prepared. Very versatile and you can control the level of spiciness.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons diced Aleppo chiles, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add onion, bell pepper, chiles, and red pepper flakes
Cook and stir until onions are soft and translucent, 5 to 6 minutes
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add tomatoes, with their juices, and season with salt and pepper
Cook until tomatoes are softened, 4 to 6 minutes
Add eggs to the skillet, tilting the skillet until eggs cover skillet completely
Cook until eggs are set, 3 to 5 minutes
Top with basil and feta cheese
